name: STRESS (UGGames)
description:
STRESS

The strategy game in which you can play different games and levels one different from the other, be it playability, objectives or obstacles. Do you think it's easy and you'll get bored of winning everything several times? Try it! It will not be as easy or as simple as it looks in the images. If you want to entertain and test yourself, this game is the right one! What are you waiting for? Play it!
